title: Runway releases its first world model, adds native audio to latest video model
description: Runway debuts a physics-aware world model that simulates reality to train agents and power video, robotics, and avatar applications.
content: Runway debuts a physics-aware world model that simulates reality to train agents and power video, robotics, and avatar applications.
